article.Heading: The Big Tax Reset – Ep 1
article.Body:
This could very well be a historic budget. One that sets the roadmap to simplify corporate taxation, eliminate exemptions and deductions and reduce the corporate tax rate to 25%

But then…Finance Minister Arun Jaitely is also walking a fiscal tightrope. The promise to bring the fiscal deficit down to 3.5% in the face of global economic headwinds and additional expenditure on pump priming the economy and paying higher government salaries and retirement benefits to the armed forces. So what will he do? To answer that Menaka Doshi of CNBC-TV18 is joined by three tax experts, Nishith Desai, Dinesh Kanabar and Pranav Sayta.
